verses: All bunnies must die by fire
Any bunny found to have survived death by fire shall be nuked from orbit
Any bunny found to have survived death by fire and nuking shall be considered the ultimate evil and shall be cast into the eternal void
All bunny deaths shall be in tribute to the Misfit
Any person found to be harbouring a bunny shall be purified by fire
All people must sacrifice one bunny per day in the name of Misfit
All followers of the Misfit shall shepherd the masses in their daily sacrifice
True believers of the Misfit shall nom bunny stew once fortnightly
Bunny lovers shall be named heathen and must be purified by fire
